H0.text: what channel does thursday night football come on regular tv. CBS

H1.text: what channel does thursday night football come on regular tv. FOX

H2.text: what channel does thursday night football come on regular tv. ESPN

H3.text: what channel does thursday night football come on regular tv. NBC

A4.text: Under the agreement, all of the Thursday Night Football telecasts would be produced by CBS Sports and called by CBS's primary announcing team of Jim Nantz and Phil Simms.

A5.text: In 2018, the rights shifted to Fox, through the 2022 season.

A7.text: Fox would air eleven games per season in simulcast with NFL Network, replacing CBS and NBC.

A8.text: the NFL on Fox (also known as Fox NFL) is the branding used for broadcasts of National Football League (NFL) games produced by Fox Sports and televised on the Fox broadcast network.
